title: In a class, the students who passed exam are 70% of the total number of students and the student who failed are 18 in number. How many students are there in classes and how many of them passed? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let total number of students be x Students passed=x×70/100=7x/10 7x/10+18=x 7x/10-x=-18 -3x/10=-18 X=60
No. Of students failed 18,i.e.30% So total no.of students in the class-,18/30×100=60 No.of students.passed 60–18=42 Or 70% of60=60×70/100=42
